casebody.data:
MOTION DOCKET

95-576. State ex rel. Brecksville Edn. Assn./OEA/NEA v. State Emp. Relations Bd.

In Mandamus. On answer of respondent. Sua sponte, alternative writ granted.

Moyer, C.J., and Wright, J., dissent and would dismiss the cause. Douglas, J., dissents and would grant a peremptory writ.
